channel.title: Stalling system?
channel.description:
If you do certain actions in runescape (for example you do turkey emote) it STALLS YOU meaning that you can't do anything else. If you for example get teleported to minigame while doing turkey emote it teleports you after you have done emote. I wonder how could I implement this system to 718 source?
Theres also interface stall where interface stalls something from happening and it happens after its closed. Could you do same thing with interfaces?

item.title: Stalling system?
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:3, topic:478492”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=596717.msg4201513#msg4201513 date=1358271446]
You have to use an event/cycle handler.
[/quote]

This.

Keep in mind that RuneScape utilizes constant Processing.[/quote]

Read full topic
